name: .GADGET File Extension
summary: Learn about .GADGET files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In Windows 7 and Windows Vista, users can double-click a GADGET file to install the gadget it contains. In Windows 8 and Windows 10, users can use the third-party application 8GadgetPack to install GADGET files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
